gameCore

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameCore.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Monster, Player

    public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    A Character is a superclass for all of the animated creatures inside the game. Player, and Monsters (subclass of NPC) are subclasses of character.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group D, Main author: Karen Madore Group D Members --------------- Karen Madore Trang Pham Darrell Penner

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(java.lang.String name,
         int health,
         int attack,
         Tile myPosition)
        Constructs a character
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the character
        health - - a character starts with an initial health value. Health points are lost during battles, 0 points=character dead
        attack - - a character starts with an initial attack value. Attack points are lost/gained during battles.
        myPosition - - a tile where the character is currently located

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public boolean attack(Character c)
        Attack method allows one character to attack another. Health points are lost during an attack.
        Parameters:
        c - - another character. The defender of the attack.
        Returns:
        true if defender died and I have moved. Comments: Subtract the myHealth by value of the other character attack value Same for the defender.

      • use

        public void use(Item i)
        Use the item up - ie a weapon will increase your attack value --- not used in v2 ---
        Parameters:
        i - - the item chosen from character's inventory

      • use

        public void use(Item i,
       Character c)
        Method to use an item like a weapon on a character.
        Parameters:
        i - - item to use. It will be removed from the characters inventory unless it is a weapon.
        c - - character to use this item on.

      • adjustHealth

        public void adjustHealth(int value)
        Adjust the Health of player
        Parameters:
        value - - a negative value decreases the player's health, a positive value increases the player's health

      • dropItem

        public void dropItem(Item i)
        Removes the item from the Characters inventory and add it to the tile's inventory
        Parameters:
        i -

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem(Item i)
        Check to see if the character has the item in his inventory
        Parameters:
        i - - item you wish to check
        Returns:
        true if item is found in character's inventory, otherwise false

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Check to see if character is dead. Currently, if the health value reaches 0.
        Returns:
        true if character is dead, otherwise false.

      • getInventoryString

        public java.lang.String getInventoryString()
        Construct a string of the character's inventory
        Returns:
        a string representation of the character's inventory

      • getInventory

        public Inventory getInventory()
        Returns the inventory for use in the View
        Returns:
        the inventory the player is carrying
